paths.name: ACARS Realated Query
path: select * from msg_mon order by msg_timestamp
select * from fltseg where aircraftreg='N492AS' and identity='8947293'

paths.name: ACARS Processed Message Count Query
path:
SELECT count(*)
--mon.msg_id, mon.msg_type, mon.acars_hist_id, mon.tail_num, mon.msg_timestam, mon.process_time, mon.receive_time, mon.complete, ah.message, mon.aircraftreg
FROM MSG_MON mon LEFT JOIN dptails dp on dp.aircraftreg = mon.aircraftreg and dp.airline = 'AS' LEFT JOIN acars_history ah on ah.Identity = mon.acars_hist_id WHERE mon.process_time < (CURRENT + 475 UNITS MINUTE)
-- 5 minutes grace period
AND mon.receive_time is null AND ((mon.msg_type = 'APU34' AND dp.etops_ind > -1 AND dp.dummy = 0) OR mon.msg_type = 'PING34')

paths.name: Aircom SQl Query for details of msg
path: select * from [dbo].[Messages]  order by MsgTs desc

paths.name: Sabre Swap Issue
path:
SELECT
f.flt, f.identity, f.orig, f.dest, f.zulu_setd, f.l_date, t.pax_f_max, (t.pax_y_max + t.pax_yc_max), f.pallet,
t.vmeqtype,t.res_fleet_type,t.aircraftreg
FROM swapaudit
INNER JOIN fltseg f ON f.identity = s.fltsegid
INNER JOIN dptails t ON t.aircraftreg = f.aircraftreg AND t.airline = f.ac
WHERE
f.ac = 'AS'
AND t.vmeqtype == ''
AND f.flt_orig_date = '02/25/22'
AND (f.opstype NOT IN('CXL', 'OVR', 'RET') OR f.opstype IS NULL)AND s.fleetchange = 'Y'
AND (s.res_notified IS NULL OR s.res_notified = 'N')
ORDER BY f.ac, f.flt, f.zulu_etd, s.identity
--AND f.flt = 121 AND f.aircraftreg = 'N928AK'
--AND f.aircraftreg = 'N933AK'
select vmeqtype ,res_fleet_type,aircraftreg ,* from dptails where vmeqtype =''

paths.name: WebSendTimes Delay Mismatch
path: select d_delay,* from fltseg where orig='' and localdate=today-1
select * from flight_history where fltsegid= order by lastmodtime

paths.name: Fltseg Table Update
path: update fltseg set l_date='26MAY' where l_date='25MAY' and identity=6620836 and routeid=28902552

insert into fltseg(routeid, flt, op_suffix,leg1, orig, l_date, z_date, etd, dest, eta, vtime, desk, shift, etd24, eta24, vt24, acft, actype,line_no, pallet, pbt, frt, pl_pld, pl_tow, pl_burn, pl_enrt, tfburn, pl_alt1, pl_alt2, alt1, alt2,
 t_out, t_off, t_on, t_in, tfob, afob, d_delay, tow, burn,enrt, c_enrt, c_burn, send, done, cxltime, notes, rc1, rc2, rc3, rc4, keyword, min_f, lp, tanker, icao, fptype, colors, who, lgw, gate, agent, fueler, setd, seta, irrops,
  opstype, opsreas, leg, occur_orig, occur_dest, etstatus, ac, wxfile, gate_in, agent_in, arctic, flifo, localdate, timesource, cycles, ice_priority, ice_status, ice_edc, pax_f, pax_y, lastupdate, fly_faster, crew_called_in, delay_code,
  gallons_added, at_out, at_off, at_on, at_in, flags, cm_name, crew_qual, pl_tanker, atc, sabre_upd_tm, toa, pl_toa, perf_report, star_flt, board_status, zulu_setd, zulu_seta, zulu_etd, zulu_eta, zulu_out, zulu_off, zulu_on,
  zulu_in, zulu_vt, mkt_airline, req_frt, pld_frt, flt_orig_date, sched_orig, sched_dest, sched_iata_type, sched_configver, flics_feed_ind, zulu_pax_setd, zulu_pax_seta, release_tow, pl_mel_fuel, pl_delay_fuel, pl_biz_fuel,
  mel_fuel, delay_fuel, biz_fuel, released_pbt, restricted, crew_in, crew_out, deplaned, mto_fuel, pilot_add_fuel, tanker_extra, pl_zfw, zfw, zulu_crew_eta, watch, aircraftreg)
